title: Santos, Zetterberg, Lindwall - If Nothing Else (2015)
description: Susana Santos Silva / Torbjörn Zetterberg / Hampus Lindwall If Nothing Else 2015 - Clean Feed Records: CF348CD http://www.cleanfeed-records.com/product/if-nothing-else/ * Susana Santos Silva: trumpet, flugelhorn * Torbjörn Zetterberg: double bass * Hampus Lindwall: organ http://www.susanasantossilva.com/ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Torbj%C3%B6rn_Zetterberg_Hot_Five http://www.hampuslindwall.com/ Recorded in Église du Saint-Esprit in Paris, France, on Feburary 20th, 21st and 23rd, 2014. Reviews ~~~~~~~ By Stef http://www.freejazzblog.org/2015/11/the-various-faces-of-susanna-santos.html [...] The album consists of eleven improvisations, and they keep their unique approach to the overall sound and interaction in a very consistent way, often fascinating, daring, and above all mesmerising and moving. Even the last track, "One Note Song", is exactly what it says, yet when the beginning sounds like the sustained sound of a fog horn of a distant ship, the shifts in intensity and timbre turn it into something more somber and devastating, with just one note, just to showcase the vision behind the music and the quality of the three musicians to deliver it. -- By Grego Applegate Edwards Guy Peters (nl) http://www.enola.be/muziek/artikels/25997:the-portuguese-connection-2015-pt-5-susana-santos-silva-earnear Predrag Vlahović (ba) http://www.jazzin.rs/santos-silva-zetterberg-lindwall-if-nothing-else-clean-feed/ Leif Carlsson (se) http://www.lira.se/skivrecension/if-nothing-else/ Joacim Nyberg (se) http://www.soundofmusic.nu/recension/torbjorn-zetterberg-x2 Jan Granlie (no) http://salt-peanuts.eu/record/santos-silva-zetterberg-lindwall/ Por Nuno Catarino (pt) https://www.publico.pt/2016/02/10/culturaipsilon/critica/a-expressividade-de-susana-1722823
